body.name: COOLINA Knife Promaja - Handmade Multipurpose Chef’s Knife, Carbon Steel Knife with Wooden Handle for Indoor and Outdoor Cooking | Well Balanced and Elegant Knife
features: BADASS, DEPENDABLE, UNSTOPPABLE. This is our top-selling knife. Inspired by Serbian craftsmanship, this blade is unstoppable and down-right ruthless. This knife will become your “go-to” due to its versatility and durability. You’ll barely keep this on your rack.
DESIGNED TO REPLACE EVERY KNIFE IN YOUR KITCHEN. This bad boy can slice and chop nearly anything beneath it. Traditionally hand-forged with 100% high-carbon steel for razor-sharp cutting power.

LIFETIME GUARANTEE. We choose our top-notch materials and construction for their durability and, in turn, created knives that'll last a lifetime - guaranteed. We cover defects in the material and the craftsmanship of knives. You get a new one at no charge.

MAKES A GREAT GIFT. If you want a jaw-dropping reaction, this is your perfect bet. Our repeat customer once said, "My husband is a hard man to buy for, but he told me it was the best gift he has ever received!" The best gifts are those that people use daily (but maybe they don't always want to spend the $$ even though they deserve it).
body.description: MAKES KITCHEN WORK A BREEZE.This Serbian Chef Knife will make your kitchen work faster, easier, and better.Forget about using multiple knives for different meat, vegetables, and fruits. This knife works on soft fruits to frozen chunks of meat like cutting soft butter.COMES IN SHARP & STAYS SHARP.We made sure that you can use the knife right out of the box, being extremely sharp and ready for action.The Carbon Steel blade stays sharp for a long time compared with stainless steel and is super easy to sharpen too.CUTS ANYTHING EASILY.This multi-purpose knife can replace virtually any knife in your kitchen.Cut the backbone of your turkey, your steak, frozen meat, or any of your fresh fruits and vegetables.The ultimate knife for kitchen and outdoor cooking.WELL-BALANCED FULL TANG.Highly durable with a full tang, giving you maximum functionality with every use.Hand-forged by artisans with signature Sarchach Serbian Steel.CARE INSTRUCTION: Best sharpened at less than or equal to 30 degrees sharp on both sides. Put some cooking or vegetable oil before storing to avoid rust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and multifunctional
reviews.reviewText: Gave as a gift to the 2 gentlemen chefs in my family and they are thrilled with how easily it cuts and slices everything..from steaks to vegetables and on and on. Can’t say enough about the quality of the knife and the prompt response to questions….outstanding customer service. Very impressed with this company. Buy it for the Chef you know…you will be proud to present it . Terrific knife and quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Every chef and amateur BBQ buff needs one! I love it! The weight is just right, stays sharp and its the most versatile tool for carving ribs, tomahawks, ribyes.... A bit pricey, but worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wife used it to cut a game hen in half and she couldnt believe how easily it cut through the bone. The thing is a bit better n the jury side but sharp as a razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a present for my son. He is very happy with it. likes the weight of the knife and the overall look and feel too. Good quality product. Seller made a very timely shipment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Rusted and dull
reviews.reviewText: Knife arrived rusted along the cutting edge. Rust will not wash off. Knife is unusable for food. Incredibly disappointing for a rather pricey knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Didn't need it but I love it, good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great knife, very sharp and does fantastic on the meat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds an Edge; Easy to Handle
reviews.reviewText: The Coolina Altomino Chef's Knife was something I'd wanted to try after several failed attempts at searching for a decent chef's knife in this configuration.The knife is sharp-sharp-sharp and holds an edge for quite a while. It does especially well with fruits and vegetables (my primary use for chopping/dicing), but also handles meats well if they are mostly defrosted yet can provide a little resistance when slicing through the meat. (I usually slice chicken or pork with the Coolina, it does well for either application.)If the edge dulls a little, be sure to use a quality 2-step knife sharpener that "cures" the edge, then hones it to razor-sharpness. It's wise that once you've finished with the knife that you rinse it with dish soap and water, then dry it immediately and wipe the exposed blade with a paper towel and a little olive oil, then wipe again with a dry paper towel to remove any residual oil. Doing so prevents rust.This product is not stainless-steel, but forged-hardened steel that will rust if neglected. Best to store this either in its cloth bag, or on a magnetic knife strip attached to your kitchen wall.
